title.narrative: Food security for rural households in Iraq

description.narrative: The objectives of the project are to improve food security and mitigate the impact of rapidly rising food prices by increasing the domestic production of vegetables in Iraq. The project will target food insecure rural households including marginal farmers, agricultural wage earners and those households who could also utilise available space for home gardens. The total targeted beneficiaries are 5000 rural households (comprised of approximately of 32 000 individuals). The project activities will be concentrated in the Governorates of Erbil, Baghdad, Missan, Thiqar and Basrah.
